citations.narrative:
The licensee reports that two reindeer were killed by rutting bulls during September of 2023. A yearling female reindeer
named “Zero” was rammed in the side by the bull “Tweedle Dum” on September 15th, 2023. Despite his antlers being
removed, the trauma from the impact resulted in injuries that ultimately lead to her death. This reindeer died before the
licensee arrived with her at the veterinary clinic. The licensee stated that the necropsy showed the cause of death as a
large amount of internal bleeding.
A 3-year-old male reindeer named “Yukon” was gored in the side by the bull “Hermie”. The licensee transported “Yukon”
to the attending veterinarian. Despite veterinary care, “Yukon” was found dead the following morning.
Failure to address potential concerns of housing reindeer together during rutting season can result in animal injury or
death. The licensee must ensure that all animals housed in the same primary enclosure are compatible.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Licensee.
n

narrative:
3.133  Critical
   
Separation. 
The licensee reports that two reindeer were killed by rutting bulls during September of 2023. A yearling female reindeer 
named “Zero” was rammed in the side by the bull “Tweedle Dum” on September 15th, 2023. Despite his antlers being 
removed, the trauma from the impact resulted in injuries that ultimately lead to her death. This reindeer died before the 
licensee arrived with her at the veterinary clinic. The licensee stated that the necropsy showed the cause of death as a 
large amount of internal bleeding. 
A 3-year-old male reindeer named “Yukon” was gored in the side by the bull “Hermie”. The licensee transported “Yukon” 
to the attending veterinarian. Despite veterinary care, “Yukon” was found dead the following morning.  
Failure to address potential concerns of housing reindeer together during rutting season can result in animal injury or 
death. The licensee must ensure that all animals housed in the same primary enclosure are compatible. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Licensee.
